article: An old man found a sparrow with a broken wing. He brought it home and nursed it back to  _  . Afterwards, though it could fly, the sparrow  _  to leave the house. The old man`s wife asked her husband to get rid of the bird as it was  _  the house.But he wouldn`t listen. One day while her husband was asleep, the woman  _  the sparrow, took it far away from the house,and let it go,warning it never to  _  . The old man missed his friend and hoped it would come back,  _  it never did. Then one day,several weeks later,he was walking past an old house when he heard a  _  sound.He looked up and there was the  _  , sitting on the gate.The sparrow gave the old man a gold  _  it had found in the house. The old man did not  _  much about money,but his wife was  _  when she saw the coin,and made up her mind to get more from the sparrow.  _  ,early the next morning she slipped out of her house and made her  _  to the old house.When she saw the sparrow she  _  it to return. "If you have found  _  ,bring it along and I`ll spend it all on you."she promised. The sparrow brought her an old  _  with the help of its friends.The basket was  _  but the woman did not wait to find out what was in it.She grabbed it and ran,  _  that the sparrow would follow and take up residence in her house again.
